From: Bill Ferguson [mailto:ferguson3@gmail.com] Sent: Sunday, February 05, 2012 8:09 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Hi Steve,
Everything's going reasonably well.. I don't foresee MBO projects until Q2.
On Mon, Jan 30, 2012 at 12:29 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: William,
How’s it going?! It’s been a while since we last spoke – I wanted to see how the contract search was going. I know you mentioned you might have something coming up in Feb. Hope your enjoying 2012 so far J
Steve
___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
